name: Limbo Jump
description:
You are stuck in limbo and must collect the coins to pay your escape and open the doors of your exit. You are not alone however, a monster chases after you the more you progress.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Made for Nitro Jam 2022 (couldn't submit in time lol)

Art:

https://arks.itch.io/dungeon-platform-tileset

Custom art by me

Music:

https://void1gaming.itch.io/free-horror-music-pack
